snippet.title: BEST FIENDS FOREVER Gameplay
snippet.description:
Get ready for a timeless clicker adventure through time -- the second part to the award-winning Best Fiends TRILOGY!

The Fiends of Minutia finally make it to Mount Boom, only to get crushed by the mighty Slug King. Now it's time for Temper to turn the tables! Round up the old gang, level them up and defeat wave after wave of slugs. Then rewind time, lose all your progress, and still somehow love it!

With the awesome might of the Meteorb and the multitude of relics it produces, you'll defeat the Slug King in no time! And that no time will take an eternity! It's really hard to explain. Just get it, click away, get hooked, and then get mad that we ever made such a game. Best Fiends FOREVER!

* TRAVEL through the world of Minutia, and through time!
* CLICK, COLLECT & LEVEL UP pretty much everything in the game!
* LEARN MATH trying to understand how much damage you're doing!
* LOSE TOUCH with your family and friends!
* RECOMMEND it to others!

iTunes link: https://itunes.apple.com/nz/app/best-fiends-forever/id1059405547?mt=8&at=1l3vmto
